类型: Size: One Size PlusColor: Bronze Green
评论详情: This is a very nice silk robe/kimono, beautiful and at a great price! I wear a size 12/14 so I bought the plus size option. I love the way it fits, but I think the other size probably would have worked as well. If you’re mid-sized like me you will probably be able to wear the smaller one if you want it tight/figure flattering, but the plus size kimono will be more loose-fitting, comfortable, and you don’t have to worry about anything peeking out. The plus size is very accommodating, with ample room to spare if you’re larger than 12/14.  I bought a second one in the red color as a birthday gift for a friend, which she absolutely loved. She said it was the most luxurious thing she’s ever worn!
The satin used in this robe is of excellent quality and the print is really beautiful. I just wear it around the house but you could easily wear it as a statement piece if you styled it correctly.

I’m 5’3 tall so length was right at my ankles which was perfect. If you are larger than a size 6 I’d go with one size plus. Bc I’m only a 2 and one fit perfectly fit me. It’s so lovely! A beautiful purchase!
